chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 mini has the above problem: 
The device should be in very good condition, but there are obvious damages to the casing visible. I would give a price discount if it were, but I would still keep the device.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded 60.00€ to the customer for grade.

Kind regards, 
Angelica from Back Market
